00040 char code node_name[] = "SCS-900";
00041 
00042 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00043 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00044 
00045 /* AD7718 pins */
00046 sbit ADC_P1   = P1 ^ 1;         // P1
00047 sbit ADC_NRES = P1 ^ 2;         // !Reset
00048 sbit ADC_SCLK = P1 ^ 3;         // Serial Clock
00049 sbit ADC_NCS  = P1 ^ 4;         // !Chip select
00050 sbit ADC_NRDY = P1 ^ 5;         // !Ready
00051 sbit ADC_DOUT = P1 ^ 6;         // Data out
00052 sbit ADC_DIN  = P1 ^ 7;         // Data in
00053 
00054 /* LTC2600 pins */
00055 sbit DAC_NCS  = P0 ^ 3;         // !Chip select
00056 sbit DAC_SCK  = P0 ^ 4;         // Serial Clock
00057 sbit DAC_CLR  = P0 ^ 5;         // Clear
00058 sbit DAC_DOUT = P0 ^ 6;         // Data out
00059 sbit DAC_DIN  = P0 ^ 7;         // Data in
00060 
00061 /* analog switch */
00062 sbit UNI_DAC = P1 ^ 0;          // DAC bipolar/unipolar
00063 sbit UNI_ADC = P0 ^ 2;          // ADC bipolar/unipolar
00064 
00065 /* AD7718 registers */
00066 #define REG_STATUS     0
00067 #define REG_MODE       1
00068 #define REG_CONTROL    2
00069 #define REG_FILTER     3
00070 #define REG_ADCDATA    4
00071 #define REG_ADCOFFSET  5
00072 #define REG_ADCGAIN    6
00073 #define REG_IOCONTROL  7
00074 
00075 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00076 
00077 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00078 
00079 struct {
00080    float adc[8];
00081    float dac[8];
00082    char  uni_dac;
00083    char  uni_adc;
00084    char  adc_25;
00085 } idata user_data;
00086

00125 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00126 
00127 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00128 
00129 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00130 {
00131    unsigned char i;
00132 
00133    ADC0CN = 0x00;               // disable ADC 
00134    DAC0CN = 0x00;               // disable DAC0
00135    DAC1CN = 0x00;               // disable DAC1
00136    REF0CN = 0x00;               // disenable internal reference
00137 
00138    /* push-pull:
00139       P0.0    TX
00140       P0.1
00141       P0.2    SW_ADC
00142       P0.3    DAC_NCS
00143 
00144       P0.4    DAC_SCK
00145       P0.5    DAC_DIN
00146       P0.6 
00147       P0.7    DAC_CLR
00148     */
00149    PRT0CF = 0xBD;
00150    P0 = 0xFF;
00151 
00152    /* push-pull:
00153       P1.0    SW_DAC
00154       P1.1
00155       P1.2    ADC_NRES
00156       P1.3    ADC_SCLK
00157 
00158       P1.4    ADC_NCS
00159       P1.5    
00160       P1.6 
00161       P1.7    ADC_DIN
00162     */
00163    PRT1CF = 0x9D;
00164    P1 = 0xFF;
00165 
00166    /* initial EEPROM value */
00167    if (init) {
00168 
00169       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00170          user_data.dac[i] = 0;
00171    }
00172 
00173    /* set-up DAC & ADC */
00174    DAC_CLR = 1;
00175    ADC_NRES = 1;
00176    write_adc(REG_FILTER, 82);                   // SF value for 50Hz rejection
00177    write_adc(REG_MODE, 3);                      // continuous conversion
00178    write_adc(REG_CONTROL, adc_chn << 4 | 0x0F); // Chn. 1, +2.56V range
00179 
00180    /* write DACs and UNI_BIP */
00181    for (i=0 ; i<8 ; i++)
00182       user_write(i+8);
00183 
00184    user_write(16);
00185 
00186    /* swich unipolar/bipolar */
00187    user_data.uni_dac = 0;
00188    user_data.uni_adc = 0;
00189    user_data.adc_25 = 0;
00190    
00191    UNI_DAC = user_data.uni_dac;
00192    UNI_ADC = !user_data.uni_adc;
00193 }
00194 
00195 #pragma NOAREGS
00196 
00197 /*---- DAC functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00198 
00199 void write_dac_cmd(unsigned char cmd, unsigned char adr, unsigned short d)
00200 {
00201 unsigned char i, m, b;
00202 
00203    DAC_NCS = 0; // chip select
00204 
00205    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00206       DAC_SCK = 0;
00207       DAC_DIN = (cmd & m) > 0;
00208       DAC_SCK = 1;
00209       m >>= 1;
00210    }
00211    
00212    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00213       DAC_SCK = 0;
00214       DAC_DIN = (adr & m) > 0;
00215       DAC_SCK = 1;
00216       m >>= 1;
00217    }
00218 
00219    b = d >> 8;
00220    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00221       DAC_SCK = 0;
00222       DAC_DIN = (b & m) > 0;
00223       DAC_SCK = 1;
00224       m >>= 1;
00225    }
00226    b = d & 0xFF;
00227    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00228       DAC_SCK = 0;
00229       DAC_DIN = (b & m) > 0;
00230       DAC_SCK = 1;
00231       m >>= 1;
00232    }
00233 
00234    DAC_NCS = 1; // remove chip select
00235 }
00236 
00237 unsigned char code dac_index[8] = {4, 5, 2, 3, 1, 0, 7, 6};
00238 
00239 void write_dac(unsigned char index) reentrant
00240 {
00241    unsigned short d;
00242 
00243    if (user_data.uni_dac) {
00244       if (user_data.dac[index] < 0)
00245          user_data.dac[index] = 0;
00246   
00247       if (user_data.dac[index] > 10)
00248          user_data.dac[index] = 10;
00249 
00250       d = user_data.dac[index] / 10 * 65535 + 0.5;
00251    } else {
00252       if (user_data.dac[index] < -10)
00253          user_data.dac[index] = -10;
00254   
00255       if (user_data.dac[index] > 10)
00256          user_data.dac[index] = 10;
00257 
00258       d = (user_data.dac[index] + 10) / 20 * 65535 + 0.5;
00259    }
00260 
00261    /* do mapping */
00262    index = dac_index[index % 8];
00263    write_dac_cmd(0x3, index, d);
00264 }
00265 
00266 /*---- ADC functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00267 
00268 void write_adc(unsigned char a, unsigned char d)
00269 {
00270    unsigned char i, m;
00271 
00272    /* write to communication register */
00273 
00274    ADC_NCS = 0;
00275    
00276    /* write zeros to !WEN and R/!W */
00277    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00278       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00279       ADC_DIN  = 0;
00280       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00281    }
00282 
00283    /* register address */
00284    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00285       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00286       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00287       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00288       m >>= 1;
00289    }
00290 
00291    ADC_NCS = 1;
00292 
00293    /* write to selected data register */
00294 
00295    ADC_NCS = 0;
00296 
00297    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00298       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00299       ADC_DIN  = (d & m) > 0;
00300       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00301       m >>= 1;
00302    }
00303 
00304    ADC_NCS = 1;
00305 }
00306 
00307 void read_adc8(unsigned char a, unsigned char *d)
00308 {
00309    unsigned char i, m;
00310 
00311    /* write to communication register */
00312 
00313    ADC_NCS = 0;
00314    
00315    /* write zero to !WEN and one to R/!W */
00316    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00317       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00318       ADC_DIN  = (i == 1);
00319       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00320    }
00321 
00322    /* register address */
00323    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00324       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00325       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00326       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00327       m >>= 1;
00328    }
00329 
00330    ADC_NCS = 1;
00331 
00332    /* read from selected data register */
00333 
00334    ADC_NCS = 0;
00335 
00336    for (i=0,m=0x80,*d=0 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00337       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00338       if (ADC_DOUT)
00339          *d |= m;
00340       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00341       m >>= 1;
00342    }
00343 
00344    ADC_NCS = 1;
00345 }
00346 
00347 void read_adc24(unsigned char a, unsigned long *d)
00348 {
00349    unsigned char i, m;
00350 
00351    /* write to communication register */
00352 
00353    ADC_NCS = 0;
00354    
00355    /* write zero to !WEN and one to R/!W */
00356    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00357       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00358       ADC_DIN  = (i == 1);
00359       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00360    }
00361 
00362    /* register address */
00363    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00364       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00365       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00366       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00367       m >>= 1;
00368    }
00369 
00370    ADC_NCS = 1;
00371 
00372    /* read from selected data register */
00373 
00374    ADC_NCS = 0;
00375 
00376    for (i=0,*d=0 ; i<24 ; i++) {
00377       *d <<= 1;
00378       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00379       *d |= ADC_DOUT;
00380       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00381    }
00382 
00383    ADC_NCS = 1;
00384 }
00385 
00386 unsigned char code adc_index[8] = {6, 7, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
00387 
00388 void adc_read()
00389 {
00390    unsigned char i;
00391    unsigned long value;
00392    float gvalue;
00393 
00394    if (ADC_NRDY)
00395        return;
00396 
00397    read_adc24(REG_ADCDATA, &value);
00398 
00399    /* convert to volts */
00400    gvalue = ((float)value / (1l<<24)) * 2.56;
00401 
00402    /* round result to 5 digits */
00403    gvalue = floor(gvalue*1E5+0.5)/1E5;
00404 
00405    /* apply range */
00406    if (user_data.adc_25 == 0) {
00407       if (user_data.uni_adc)
00408          gvalue *= 10.0/2.56;
00409       else
00410          gvalue = gvalue/2.56*20.0 - 10;
00411    }
00412 
00413    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00414    user_data.adc[adc_chn] = gvalue;
00415    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00416 
00417    /* start next conversion */
00418    adc_chn = (adc_chn + 1) % 8;
00419    i = adc_index[adc_chn];
00420    write_adc(REG_CONTROL, i << 4 | 0x0F); // adc_chn, +2.56V range
00421 }
00422 
00423 void adc_calib()
00424 {
00425    unsigned char i;
00426 
00427    for (i=0 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00428 
00429       write_adc(REG_CONTROL, i << 4 | 0x0F);
00430 
00431       /* zero calibration */
00432       write_adc(REG_MODE, 4);
00433       while (ADC_NRDY) led_blink(1, 1, 100);
00434 
00435       /* full scale calibration */
00436       write_adc(REG_MODE, 5);
00437       while (ADC_NRDY) led_blink(1, 1, 100);
00438    }
00439 
00440    /* restart continuous conversion */
00441    write_adc(REG_MODE, 3);
00442 }
00443 
00444 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00445 
00446 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00447 {
00448    if (index > 7 && index < 16)
00449       write_dac(index-8);
00450 }

00454 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00455 {
00456    if (index);
00457    return 0;
00458 }

00460 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00461 
00462 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00463 {
00464    /* echo input data */
00465    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00466    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00467    return 2;
00468 }

00470 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00471 
00472 void user_loop(void)
00473 {
00474    adc_read();
00475 }
